name: Horatio's Story
description:
Dive into the eerie world of Unhallowed Metropolis. Horatio's Story is a pre-quel to Fandible's actual play series of Unhallowed Metropolis.

Play as the aristocratic Horatio Clayton, an idealist seeking to make neo-Victorian London a better place for those who lack his privilege. Explore a London shrouded in fog, and filled with zombies lurking in the most unexpected places.
